Note: 

 1. 'I want to manually customise' option let's you choose important components such as CPU, GPU and Motherboard. If you do not have any prior knowledge of these components, we do not recommend you to choose them on your own because you might run into compatibility issues or bottlenecked performance. 

 2. Manual customisation of storage, RAM or any other component changes the price against the recommended build. Please make sure that you customise according to your personal preference and budget. 

 3. Components selected by the app in recommendation for your PC are subject to change with current market price and availability. Rest assured, we are here to make the best build for you for the money. So keep calm and trust MakeMyBuild.
